titleStmt.title: A true relation of an imposition layed by the late king upon the manufactures of gold & silver-wyer to be used in the making of gold & silver thred, &c. : Which was voted by the grand Committee of Parliament to be a monopoly. / Written by one that was well acquainted with all the proceedings. ; Published by D.T. a lover of truth.
titleStmt.author: D. T.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.C. and are to be sold at the Fountaine in Goldsmiths-row in Cheapside,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: University of Pennsylvania. Library.
